comments.body: Please ask upstream to add `MANIFEST.in` with the `LICENSE` file included.

So maybe make a comment like this for now in the recipe should be sufficient. Feel free to change the wording as you see fit.

``` yaml
  # Please remember to add the license file after the PR is merged and included in a release.
  # https://github.com/ESGF/esgf-pyclient/pull/7
  # license_file: LICENSE
```
